articles.description: Bayern Munich appoint Vincent Kompany as their new head coach on a three-year deal after agreeing a compensation package with Burnley.
articles.title: Vincent Kompany: Bayern Munich appoint Belgian as head coach after leaving Burnley

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe wasn't always the best footballing prospect. But he, and his family, had the clearest plan. Real Madrid is the final step towards an awesome goal.
articles.title: Real Madrid and Kylian Mbappe - a Champions League combination?

articles.description: Charges against world number one Scottie Scheffler are dropped following his arrest for assaulting a police officer earlier this month.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler: Charges dropped against world number one

articles.title: French Open 2024 results: Iga Swiatek edges past Naomi Osaka, Ons Jabeur through

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says the death of golfer Grayson Murray offers a reminder that the sport "pales in comparison" to what is most important in life.
articles.title: Grayson Murray: Rory McIlroy says death of fellow PGA Tour golfer 'puts everything in perspective'

articles.description: Nat Sciver-Brunt's unbeaten century leads England to a 178-run thrashing in the third ODI to seal a series win against Pakistan.
articles.title: England vs Pakistan: Sciver-Brunt century leads hosts to 2-0 ODI series win

articles.description: Bowler Mark Wood says England will have "no excuses" at the T20 World Cup, despite their disrupted build-up.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England will have "no excuses" despite weather-hit build-up - Mark Wood

articles.description: Barcelona appoint former Bayern Munich boss Hansi Flick as their new boss on a two-year contract.
articles.title: Hansi Flick: Barcelona appoint former Bayern Munich boss

articles.description: Major League Baseball adds the achievements of black players from its racially segregated past to the record books.
articles.title: Major League Baseball: Black player scores from segregated leagues added to record books
